title: Waistcoat, 1962-54-53, 1790–1800
medium: Technique: Embroidery: satin, stem and knot stitches in 16 colors of silk on silk on 7&1 satin; applique of silk 5&1 satin
creditline: Bequest of Richard Cranch Greenleaf in memory of his mother, Adeline Emma Greenleaf
description: Gentleman's waistcoat. Short waistcoat with embroidered scattered patriotic motifs. Polychrome on white.

exhibitions.title: The Greenleaf Collection: Textile Arts from the 16th to early 19th century
